web_form_fields.options:
Instructions

  1. Please ensure that all information is filled completely and accurately and correctly. Please note that we will not be able to process your forms on date of joining if these forms are incomplete and all the enclosures are not received. In that case your joining could get delayed and you will not have access to internal systems. So please ensure that joining forms along with required documents reach in time.
  2. Please leave Employee code blank. It will be filled up by the HR Deptt.
  3. You are required to submit copy of your Relieving letter / Resignation Letter duly accepted by your previous organization.
  4. Please complete Retiral forms (PF and Gratuity) in all respects.
  5. Nomination is a must in all retiral forms.
  6. You are requested to open a salary account with State Bank of India (if you don’t have) and inform the following details to Regional/ Corporate HR within a week of your joining SBIL.
  7. Your salary will get directly credited to your account. If you join SBI Life on or after 20 th of a particular month , the salary for that particular month will be paid to you along with the following months salary.
  8. For details on Group Mediclaim Insurance Coverage, please visit ebandhan/ HR Zone/ Policies/ Group Mediclaim Insurance. You are required to update details of your dependents online on Raksha TPA portal, once you receive login Ids and Passwords. Generally, login Id and Password is shared through email on 10 th day of month. Please stay connected with your Regional HR/ SPOC team for the same.
  9. Please furnish two sets of following papers / documents when you join SBI Life
A. Education Qualifications:
  1. SSC Mark sheet
  2. HSC Mark sheet
  3. Graduation Certificate / Provisional Graduation Certificate
  4. Graduation Mark sheet for Final Year (if final results have not yet been declared, please submit all previous years' mark sheets)
  5. Post Graduation Certificate / Provisional Graduation Certificate
  6. Post Graduation Final Year Mark Sheet / previous years mark sheets
  7. Any Other Additional Qualifications Certificate/ mark-sheet detailed during application
B. Work Experience Letters (Previous two employers)
  1. Copy of Relieving letter or Resignation acceptance letter from previous employers
  2. Appointment letter / Confirmation / Work Experience letter.
C. References

Reference Certificates from two referees of social standing, not related to you or particulars of two such referees with their position and contact details.

D. Proof of Birth:

Passport/PAN Card/Driving Licence/Birth Certificate/School leaving Certificate/College Leaving certificate or any other appropriate document issued by competent authority.

E.Proof of Address (you are hereby informed of residential visits of representatives from SBI Life for verification of Residence).

Passport/PAN Card/Driving License/Telephone Bill/Electricity Bill//College I-Card or any appropriate document issued by competent authority.

F. Three Passport size colour photographs
G. Salary Proof:Last 3 months salary slip I Form 16
H. Cancelled Cheque (Mandatory, If you already have Savings Bank A/c with SBI)
Important:
  • Please mail the completed Joining Forms Booklet, along with all the above mentioned documents to Corporate HR, SBI Life Insurance Co. LJd., "NATRAJ",4th Floor, M.V.Road & Western Express Highway Junction, Andheri (East), Mumbai - 400 069.
